title: AI Weekly: EU probes and India investment
Aware Super’s new CIO warns of “orange lights” in AI financing
description: Australia’s Aware Super has entered the new year with a guarded but confident view of the global artificial intelligence boom, as its newly appointed chief investment officer, Simon Warner, flags emerging fragilities in the way some AI ventures are now being financed. Warner, who took over leadership of the A$210 billion fund’s investment team last [...]The post Aware Super’s new CIO warns of “orange lights” in AI financing appeared first on Tekedia.

title: McDonald’s Netherlands removes ‘creepy, depressing and inauthentic’ AI Christmas advert
description: The ad, which features the lyric ‘It’s the most terrible time of the year’, was also criticised for being ‘more cynical about Christmas than the Grinch’.

title: Lucinity Launches Human AI Powered FinCrime Operations and Appoints New CEO to Lead Next Chapter

title: AI giants must pay for dipping into creative commons
description: Resource is extracted at an industrial scale by global AI firms without consent, credit or compensation
